title: A Studio Tour
script:
Anushka: Namaste dosto! Aaj main aapko le chalungi ek film studio ke safar par.

Anushka: Yaar, bachpan se mera sapna tha ki mai dekhu ki kaise ye filmon ki duniya banati hai.

Anushka: Toh pichle hafte, mujhe ek studio mein jaane ka mauka mila.

Anushka: Sachchi batau, pehle toh mujhe laga, "arre, yeh toh sab camera aur lights hai."

Anushka: Lekin phir maine dekha ki kaise ek choti si cheez ko bhi itni mehnat se banaya jaata hai.

Anushka: Sets itne bade the! Aur makeup wale itne talented! Unhone ek aam insan ko kuch hi minute mein star bana diya.

Anushka: Aur pata hai? Maine actors ko practice karte hue bhi dekha. Itni dedication!

Anushka: Asli magic toh behind-the-scenes mein hota hai.

Anushka: Studio tour ke baad, filmon ke liye meri izzat aur bhi badh gayi.

Anushka: Agar aapko kabhi chance mile, toh zaroor jaana. Yeh experience aapko hamesha yaad rahega! Dhanyavaad!
